name: Negating Cube
description: Users of the Strange Cube tend to think of many ways to negate unnecessary requirements.

skills.normal_des:
While on the ground, manipulate the cube to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> up to 3 times and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.
<shuzhi>Passive: If normal attacks hit targets 6 times, gain 1 cube. Up to 5 cubes can be stored.</>
skills.dodge:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area and grants hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
If the Wanderer has less than <shuzhi>5</> cubes, each successful dodge has a <shuzhi>40%</> chance to restore 1 dodge attempt.
Successful dodges do not interrupt normal attack combos.
<shuzhi>Passive: Gain a cube for every successful aerial dodge.</>
skills.skill: Create shielding for self and nearby allies to block up to <shuzhi>800%</> of ATK in damage for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> them. Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds <shuzhi>160%</> of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
skills.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and gain <shuzhi>5</> cubes after switching to this weapon, then unleash the <shuzhi>5</> cubes along with a Shockwave. This Shockwave deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and <shuzhi>strongly launches</> them into the air. Each cube also deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>. If allies are in the vicinity, the allies and the wielder gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>3</> seconds.
